title: I Wonder Which Uni Have Lol Club .
body: HI, guys. I am entering uni next year. Do we have a list that indicates which unis have lol clubï¼Ÿ It will be highly appriciated.{{champion:103}}

replies.body: Most uni's do, UTS has a large gaming club called EGG: The Gamers Guild which focus on a wide range of games played including lol

Most of them do. Theres a club for just about anyone at Uni.

USYD and UNSW have the largest ones I think
